今天给大家带来一款非常非常喜（sang）闻（xin）乐（bing）见（kuang）的极品利器——逆向合成。作者原话：
这个MOD是提供一种合成逆向的功能，目前我还没有加入游戏中的所有项目，但我最终会完善它的。正如名字所说的那样，它可以把你制作成的道具逆向成原料。例如，任何损伤度的镐都将返还三块原料；钻石镐=3块钻石，金镐=3块金锭，铁镐=3块铁锭等。这个MOD还增加了一点公式，可以通过合成得一些东西。现在马铠，马鞍，皮革和黑曜石都加入了合成公式。假如您有好的合成公式或想法，欢迎向我提出，我在本周内尽快的把它加进去。

原文：

This Mod is a revival of the craft back mod. Currently I have not added all of the items in game to the mod, but eventually I will. The function of the mod, as the name implies, allows the user to get the components used to craft an item back. For example an undamaged pickaxe of any sort will return three blocks of whatever it is made of. Diamond pickaxe=3 diamond, Gold Pickaxe= 3 Gold Ingots, Iron Pickaxe= 3 Iron Ingots, ect. This mod also adds in recipes to allow crafting for items without vanilla recipes. Now horse armor, saddles, leather, and obsidian are craftable.
Recipe suggestions are welcome, and I will get to the request as soon as possible most likely within the week.
